data.message: This is America they should of never taken out our Bibles or pledge a legas to the flag nd our country wouldn't the way it is today.help people in our country  not non citizens give them money grants homes whatever nd our people do without come on get a grip no FEMA camps

replies.message: never should have taken our Bible or pledge of allegiance to the flag out of our schools in this country. Our country would not be the way it is. Help legal citizens not illegal people who just dropped in. Stop giving them housing, medical, food and money grants while the legal citizens go without.
